name: Planet Boom
description:
This chaotic planetary defense game will have you shoot, jump, dash, and teleport across a fully destructible planet to fend off enemies flying in from all directions. Switch between multiple unique turrets, upgraded to suit your play style, for eye-popping synergetic plays!

Music by FatalExit

Demo

This is a demo and only has 11 levels. The full game will have MORE crazy turrets, MORE OP upgrades, and insane BOSS levels. It will be released on Steam and Itch in March 2022.

WISHLIST the game!! Feedback

Please leave a comment on the things you enjoyed and things you would change to make the game better. You got an idea for a cool turret or upgrade? Let me know!
